en: Position your wrists at shoulder level.
Shift onto your toes.

ru: Оторвите от поверхности грудную клетку, колени.
en: Lift your chest and knees off the surface.

ru: От макушки до пяток прямая линия.
en: A straight line from the crown of your head to your heels.
Spread your legs hip-width apart.
Pull up the toes.
Straighten the elbows so that the body is raised.
Raise the knees.
Urdhva Mukha shvanasana.
Upward-facing dog.
Extend your toes and arch your lower back.

ru: Чтобы убрать напряжение в поясничном отделе, подайте плечи вперед и вниз, чтобы руки максимально нагрузились.
en: Press your shoulders forward and down to ease tension in your lower back, shifting the work into your arms.
Place your shoulders forward, beyond the line of your wrists.
Shift onto your toes.
Bring your feet together.
Bend your elbows to a 90-degree angle.
The body is suspended.
Your body is still floating, suspended off the ground.
Chaturanga Dandasana.
Lower your knees, chin, and chest.
Lift your hips upward.
Touch the mat with your forehead.

ru: Одну ногу поднимите назад и вверх.
en: Lift one leg upward and back.
Tuck your elbows close to your torso.
Extend one arm straight out fully.
Place it back on the mat.
Lengthen your opposite arm forward.
Return your hand to the mat.
Extend both arms out to the sides.
Simultaneously lift both arms.

ru: Поднятое колено выпрямите и носок натяните на себя.
en: Extend the lifted knee into a straight line and flex the foot, drawing toes toward the torso.
Press your heel back and upwards.
Lower your arms and draw them in toward your body.
Perform push-ups.
Keep your arms fully extended.
Extend one leg back to engage your lower body.

ru: Согните вытянутую ногу и противоположной кистью перекрёстно возьмитесь за голень.
en: Bend your extended leg and cross your opposite hand to hold the shin.
Engage through your lifted leg, actively flexing your foot toward the ceiling.
Eka Hasta Vyaghrasana.
One Handed Tiger Pose.

ru: Таз сместите в сторону поднятой ноги.
en: Shift your hips towards the side of your lifted leg.
A narrow corridor.
Direct your gaze to the mat.
Extend the neck.
Tuck the toe of your grounded foot.

ru: Пятку поднятой ноги прижмите к ягодице.
en: Press the heel of your raised leg against your buttock.
Straighten your supporting leg.
Maintain your balance.

ru: Поднятую кисть поставьте на коврик, а поднятую ногу вытяните назад и вверх.
en: Return the hand back to the mat and extend the raised leg back and uprwad.
Push up by bending your elbows.
Exhale on exertion.
Place your hand back onto the mat, aligning it under your shoulder.

ru: Подайте вперед одно колено, затем другое.
en: Flow one knee forward.
